picker queue

	
	
summary



	
physics

	
		[ ] add to scene if >50% have voted for the scene


	
contingencies

		# problems
	
		
unresponsive

			[ ] Unresponsive voters lead to less than 50% consensus
		
		
ignoring

			[ ] A picker could progam to ignore the asks of certain 
				addresses.

		
selectivism

			[ ] A voter could always vote to approve
				a ranked subset of pickers.
